mapper.select: SELECT L.LEDGER_IDX , L.DATE , L.INCOME_AND_EXPENSES , L.CATEGORY , (CASE WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES = '수입' OR INCOME_AND_EXPENSES = '지출' THEN L.DESCRIPTION WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES = '이동' THEN CONCAT( (SELECT FL.ASSET_NAME FROM ASSET FL WHERE FL.ASSET_IDX = L.FORMER_ASSET) , ' → ' , (SELECT LL.ASSET_NAME FROM ASSET LL WHERE LL.ASSET_IDX = L.LATTER_ASSET)) END) DESCRIPTION , L.AMOUNT , L.ASSET_IDX , A.ASSET_NAME AS ASSET , L.FORMER_ASSET , L.LATTER_ASSET FROM LEDGER L LEFT JOIN ASSET A ON L.ASSET_IDX = A.ASSET_IDX WHERE L.USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND L.DATE = #{date} ORDER BY L.DATE DESC;

SELECT L.LEDGER_IDX , L.DATE , L.INCOME_AND_EXPENSES , L.CATEGORY , (CASE WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES = '수입' OR INCOME_AND_EXPENSES = '지출' THEN L.DESCRIPTION WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES = '이동' THEN CONCAT( (SELECT FL.ASSET_NAME FROM ASSET FL WHERE FL.ASSET_IDX = L.FORMER_ASSET) , ' → ' , (SELECT LL.ASSET_NAME FROM ASSET LL WHERE LL.ASSET_IDX = L.LATTER_ASSET)) END) DESCRIPTION , L.AMOUNT , A.ASSET_NAME AS ASSET , L.FORMER_ASSET , L.LATTER_ASSET FROM LEDGER L LEFT JOIN ASSET A ON L.ASSET_IDX = A.ASSET_IDX WHERE L.USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND L.DATE BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date} ORDER BY L.DATE DESC;

SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES='수입' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) 'INCOME', SUM( CASE WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES='지출' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) 'EXPENSES', SUM( CASE WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES='수입' THEN AMOUNT WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES='지출' THEN -AMOUNT ELSE 0 END ) 'TOTAL' FROM LEDGER WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND DATE BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LEDGER (USER_IDX, DATE, INCOME_AND_EXPENSES, CATEGORY, DESCRIPTION, AMOUNT, ASSET_IDX) VALUES (#{user_idx}, #{date}, #{income_and_expenses}, #{category}, #{description}, #{amount}, #{asset_idx})

INSERT INTO LEDGER (USER_IDX, DATE, INCOME_AND_EXPENSES, DESCRIPTION, AMOUNT, FORMER_ASSET, LATTER_ASSET) VALUES (#{user_idx}, #{date}, #{income_and_expenses}, #{description}, #{amount}, #{former_asset}, #{latter_asset})
